Name: Exosuit Upgrade Chart
Description:
Encoded navigation data which, when properly decrypted, will reveal the location of a Drop Pod containing an Exosuit Inventory Upgrade.

Select the coordinates in the inventory and use Plot Route ([E]) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

Name: Multi-tool Expansion Slot
Description:
A flexible upgrade circuit, compatible with all person Multi-Tools.

This module can be wired into a Multi-Tool at a Space Station Multi-Tool Upgrade Rack, granting the user more space in the Multi-Tool's internal layout to add further upgrades or technology specialisations.

Name: Exosuit Expansion Unit
Description:
An advanced survival technology module that allows expansion of a user's Exosuit Storage.

Pre-packed nano-expanders create stablised sub-warp voids within the Exosuit, increasing its inventory capacity. Apply this augmentation at the Exosuit upgrade terminal on board a Space Station.

Name: Mind Control Device
Description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

The mind control device plugs into the ship's trading and communications systems, allowing the Fleet Commander to gain the upper hand in any negotiation.

Name: Holographic Analyser
Description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

This powerful analytic computer overclocks the existing fleet systems, allowing for faster-than-light calculations. Heat is a problem, and the chips do not last long.

Name: Mineral Compressor
Description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

The mineral compressor allows fleet mining crews to liquidise the substances they extract, for both faster processing and easier transportation.

Name: Explosive Drones
Description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

This pack of autonomous explosives have been programmed to launch from the fleet and pilot themselves directly towards hostile vessels. Extremely dangerous.

Name: Fuel Oxidiser
Description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

This powerful fuel upgrade overloads frigate engines, allowing for faster-than-usual travel.

Name: Multi-tool Upgrade Pack
Description:
A bundle of upgrades compatible with all person Multi-Tools.

Includes a Multi-Tool Expansion Slot, which may be wired into a Multi-Tool at a Space Station Multi-Tool Upgrade Rack, as well as a unique Upgrade Module, which can be immediately installed by hand to enhance an existing Multi-Tool technology.

Name: Shield Lattice
Description: Increases the base capacity of the Hazard Protection system, allowing the user to spend longer in hazardous environments without recharging their Exosuit.

Name: Oxygen Recycler
Description: Increases the base capacity of the Life Support system, allowing the user to go longer between charges.

Name: Neural Stimulator
Description: Increases the capacity of the Exosuit's Jetpack Tanks and Adrenal Pump Reserves, allowing the user to both fly and sprint longer.

Name: Rocket Boots
Description:
Equips the Exosuit jetpack with advanced jump capabilities, allowing the user to take huge leaps with ease.

Activate jump systems by rapidly pressing JUMP.

Name: Efficient Water Jets
Description:
Improves the fuel efficiency of the jetpack's marine jets, reducing the drain on Exosuit life support systems.

Aqueous compressor units are installed into the jetpack's turbines, bypassing the large energy requirements of underwater ignition.

Name: Efficient Thrusters
Description: Upgrades the starship launch systems, decreasing the fuel cost of takeoff.

Name: Launch Auto-charger
Description:
Photovoltaic panels fitted to the starship Launch Thrusters allow for a slow trickle charge while the ship is not in operation.

Harvested light is used to fuse di-hydrogen from the atmosphere and over time will refuel the Launch Thrusters automatically.

Name: Cadmium Drive
Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's core bounding magnets, preventing rapid disassembly when attempting to reach rare-class red stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

Name: Emeril Drive
Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's shield integrity, preventing reality glitches when attempting to reach rare-class green stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

Name: Indium Drive
Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's computational matrix,  preventing temporal anomalies when attempting to reach rare-class blue stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

Name: Atlantid Drive
Description:
Sideloads a resonant memory packet into your warp computer,  allowing the ship to pass through the dissonant space surrounding purple stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

Name: Ablative Armour
Description:
Adds a layer of superheated shielding to the starship's defense array, vaporising incoming fire.

Significantly increases starship shield performance.

Name: Large Rocket Tubes
Description: Expands the loading chamber of the starship Rocket Launcher, improving exhaust performance and allowing for significantly faster heat recovery.

Name: Nonlinear Optics
Description:
Replaces the conventional Photon Cannon optics with an experimental glass array, boosting combat performance.

Significantly improves heat sink capacity.

Name: Fourier De-limiter
Description:
Rewires the Phase Beam with nanite-based circuitry, bypassing conventional reality limits on laser power.

Significantly improves heat performance.

Name: Fragment Supercharger
Description:
Overhauls the firing mechanism of the Positron Ejector, resulting in faster, more accurate particles.

Improves range and accuracy.

Name: Q-resonator
Description: Upgrades the Infra-Knife Accelerator, compressing internal waveforms to allow an extra shot to be weaved in to the conventional fire patterns.

StatBonuses.Name: Ship Weapons Guns Bullets Per Shot

Name: Dyson Pump
Description:
Replaces the heat sink of the Cyclotron Ballista by encompassing the entire unit with a heat-absorbing megastructure. Heat output is recycled to boost combat efficiency.

Significantly improves heat performance.

Name: Amplified Warp Shielding
Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's core bounding magnets, preventing rapid disassembly when attempting to reach rare-class red stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

Name: Chromatic Warp Shielding
Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's shield integrity, preventing reality glitches when attempting to reach rare-class green stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

Name: Temporal Warp Computer
Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's computational matrix,  preventing temporal anomalies when attempting to reach rare-class blue stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

Name: Resonance Matrix
Description:
Sideloads a resonant memory packet into your warp computer,  allowing the ship to pass through the dissonant space surrounding purple stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

Name: Waveform Recycler
Description:
A powerful lateral processor inserted into the Multi-Tool Scanning System allows the device to recharge at a significantly improved rate.

Increases potential scan frequency.

Name: Survey Device
Description:
A self-contained circuitry upgrade for the Analysis Visor, adding real-time terrain analysis to the scanning array.

Toggle between Visor modes with SURVEYFILTERL/SURVEYFILTERR. Use Surveying Mode to detect hidden terrain resources.

Name: Scan Harmoniser
Description:
An attachment for the Multi-Tool Scanner that allows the device to detect and decode the cloaking signal of nearby Autophage units.

Use SCAN to activate the Scanner. As its detector waveform passes over the local area, it will automatically reveal any nearby Autophage entities.

Name: Barrel Ioniser
Description:
Inserts a powerful field ionisation device into the barrel of the Boltcaster, increasing projectile stability through the air.

Improves device accuracy and allows the user to fire for longer periods without degrading combat performance.

Name: Boltcaster Ricochet Module
Description:
Creates an antimatter field around the shots of the Boltcaster, causing them to be repelled by non-damaged surfaces.

Enables ricochet, causing projectiles to bounce if they hit a target they do not damage.

Name: Plasma Resonator
Description:
A significant upgrade for the Mining Beam.

Upgrades the Mining Laser's primary crystal chamber, boosting core beam energy while decreasing unwanted heat spill.

Name: Mass Accelerator
Description:
Extends the firing chamber of the Blaze Javelin, allowing the internal particle accelerators to reach both greater mass and speed.

Significantly improves weapon damage.

Name: Waveform Oscillator
Description:
Overloads the energy beam generated by the Blaze Javelin, causing it to deliver a power electrical charge at its point of impact.

Will briefly stun any organic and inorganic entities that intersect the Blaze Javelin's beam.

Name: Shell Greaser
Description: Advanced self-lubricating components decrease friction within the Scatter Blaster, offering significant improvements to reload times.

Name: Amplified Cartridges
Description:
Specialist harmonic resonators allow the Pulse Spitter to split inserted ammunition, effective manufacturing more shots from fewer materials.

Increases weapon clip size.

Name: Pulse Spitter Ricochet Module
Description:
Creates an antimatter field around the shots of the Pulse Spitter, causing them to be repelled by non-damaged surfaces.

Enables ricochet, causing projectiles to bounce if they hit a target they do not damage.

Name: Impact Igniter
Description:
A powerful combat upgrade for the Pulse Spitter. This module installs series of delicately calibrated fuel-injection nozzles within the firing chamber, which are used to initiate a controlled burn within its plasma projectiles.

Causes targets hit by the Pulse Spitter to burn for a short while, causing additional damage.

Name: P-field Compressor
Description:
A powerful upgrade to the Neutron Cannon. Additional resonance compressors allow significantly more energy to be routed through the cannon's central core, dramatically increasing operating power.

Installation will allow a fully-charged Neutron Cannon to launch additional projectiles at higher speeds.

Name: Radar Amplifier
Description: Allows for additional building types to be acquired by the Exocraft Radar, including planetary Drop Pods, Abandoned Structures, and Waste Heaps.

Name: Radar Power Resonator
Description: Allows for additional building types to be acquired by the Exocraft Radar, including Trade Outposts, Ruins, and Alien Structures.

Name: Exocraft Boost Module
Description: An efficient plasma injector coupled to the engine that allows short bursts of speed.

Name: Advanced Exocraft Laser
Description: Increases power of the Exocraft Mining Laser.

Name: Osmotic Generator
Description:
Installed into the drive system aboard the Nautilon Submarine.

Captures energy by exploiting the saline gradient in deep water environments, allowing a slow recharge of the Humboldt Drive in the event of fuel emergencies.

Name: Self-greasing Servos
Description:
An automatically-regulated lubricant dispenser fitted to the leg joints of the Minotaur reduce friction and encourage fuel-efficient motion.

Significantly reduces fuel burn in the Minotaur's Daedalus Engine.

Name: C-class Reactor
Description:
A starship subcomponent - the reactor core. The basic generator unit is capable of powering a C-Class starship.

Acquire starship components by breaking down existing ships at the Starship Outfitting unit aboard any space station. Visit the Starship Fabricator to design and assemble a new vessel.

Name: B-class Reactor
Description:
A starship subcomponent - the reactor core. The upgraded generator unit is capable of powering a B-Class starship.

Acquire starship components by breaking down existing ships at the Starship Outfitting unit aboard any space station. Visit the Starship Fabricator to design and assemble a new vessel.

Name: A-class Reactor
Description:
A starship subcomponent - the reactor core. The advanced generator unit is capable of powering an A-Class starship.

Acquire starship components by breaking down existing ships at the Starship Outfitting unit aboard any space station. Visit the Starship Fabricator to design and assemble a new vessel.

Name: S-class Reactor
Description:
A starship subcomponent - the reactor core. The exceptional generator unit is capable of powering an S-Class starship.

Acquire starship components by breaking down existing ships at the Starship Outfitting unit aboard any space station. Visit the Starship Fabricator to design and assemble a new vessel.

The unit offers improvements to the combat and defense abilities of all expeditions.
